src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.generator
Class DefaultFlexTemplateGenerator

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.generator.DefaultFlexTemplateGenerator

class DefaultFlexTemplateGenerator

This class is used by plugin scripts to convert templates into actionscript archives, which are compiled when "grails flex-tasks" command is executed. Gives support for relationship except many-to-many

author:
Ezequiel Martin Apfel
since:
01-Feb-2009
